description: Celebrate Middle Eastern flavours with delicious dukkah mushroom and hummus wraps. Mushrooms are a hearty meat alternative in this fab vegetarian recipe.
keywords: Barbeque,Low saturated fat,BBQ vegetables,Seafood free,Vegie wrap,Egg free,Low sugar,Mushroom,BBQ,Oct 2021,High protein,Soy free,Dairy free
name: Dukkah-Crusted Mushrooms & Hummus Wraps Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 red onion, thinly sliced into rounds
0.33 cup Woolworths extra virgin olive oil
0.5 bunch continental parsley, leaves picked, finely chopped

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat a barbecue grill or chargrill pan over high heat. Stir vinegar and sugar in a small bowl until sugar has dissolved. Add onion and stir to combine. Set aside until required.

Meanwhile, place mushrooms in a large, shallow baking dish. Add seasoning and dukkah. Drizzle with 1/4 cup oil, then toss to coat. Grill mushrooms for 5 minutes on each side or until charred and softened. Thickly slice.

Meanwhile, combine parsley, remaining oil and lemon juice in a small bowl. Divide hummus among bread rounds. Top with mushroom, spinach and drained onion. Drizzle with parsley oil, fold to enclose filling and serve with lemon wedges.
